targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  occurred_at AS "time",
  mac_addr AS "sindanClientID"
FROM log_campaigns
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(occurred_at)
ORDER BY occurred_at DESC
LIMIT 30;

SELECT
  occurred_at AS "time",
  detail+0 as "Download speedtest"
FROM diagnosis_logs

WHERE
  $__timeFilter(occurred_at) and
  log_type = "v4speedtest_download" and
  log_campaign_uuid in (
    select
      log_campaign_uuid
    from log_campaigns
    where mac_addr = "$sindanClientID" )
ORDER BY occurred_at

SELECT
  occurred_at AS "time",
  detail+0 as "Upload speedtest"
FROM diagnosis_logs

WHERE
  $__timeFilter(occurred_at) and
  log_type = "v4speedtest_upload" and
  log_campaign_uuid in (
    select
      log_campaign_uuid
    from log_campaigns
    where mac_addr = "$sindanClientID" )
ORDER BY occurred_at

SELECT
  occurred_at AS "time",
  detail+0 as "v4speedtest_rtt"
FROM diagnosis_logs

WHERE
  $__timeFilter(occurred_at) and
  log_type = "v4speedtest_rtt" and
  log_campaign_uuid in (
    select
      log_campaign_uuid
    from log_campaigns
    where mac_addr = "$sindanClientID" )
ORDER BY occurred_at

SELECT
  occurred_at AS "time",
  detail+0 as "$target_v4http_srv"
FROM diagnosis_logs
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(occurred_at) and
  log_type = "v4http_websrv" and
  target = "$target_v4http_srv" and
  log_campaign_uuid IN (
  SELECT
    log_campaign_uuid
  FROM log_campaigns
  WHERE mac_addr = "$sindanClientID" )

SELECT
  occurred_at AS "time",
  detail+0 as "v4speedtest_jitter"
FROM diagnosis_logs

WHERE
  $__timeFilter(occurred_at) and
  log_type = "v4speedtest_jitter" and
  log_campaign_uuid in (
    select
      log_campaign_uuid
    from log_campaigns
    where mac_addr = "$sindanClientID" )
ORDER BY occurred_at

SELECT
  occurred_at AS "time",
  CASE
    WHEN detail LIKE '%0 packets received%' THEN 0  -- pingÇ™é∏îsÇµÇΩèÍçá
    ELSE 1  -- pingÇ™ê¨å˜ÇµÇΩèÍçá
  END AS "v4alive_srv"
FROM diagnosis_logs
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(occurred_at) AND
  log_type = "v4alive_srv" AND
  target = "$target_v4rtt_srv" and
  log_campaign_uuid IN (
    SELECT
      log_campaign_uuid
    FROM log_campaigns
    WHERE mac_addr = "$sindanClientID" )
ORDER BY occurred_at DESC

panels.description: SNR should be 20 or more for a data network.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  occurred_at AS "time",
  detail+0.0 as "rssi"
FROM diagnosis_logs
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(occurred_at) and
  log_type = "rssi" and
  log_campaign_uuid in (
    select
      log_campaign_uuid
    from log_campaigns
    where mac_addr = "$sindanClientID" )
ORDER BY occurred_at

SELECT
  occurred_at AS "time",
  detail+0.0 as "noise"
FROM diagnosis_logs
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(occurred_at) and
  log_type = "noise" and
  log_campaign_uuid in (
    select
      log_campaign_uuid
    from log_campaigns
    where mac_addr = "$sindanClientID" )
ORDER BY occurred_at

SELECT
  a.occurred_at AS "time",
  (a.detail+0.0) - (b.detail+0.0) AS "SNR"
FROM
  (
  SELECT log_campaign_uuid, occurred_at, detail
  FROM diagnosis_logs
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(occurred_at) AND
    log_type = "RSSI" AND
    log_campaign_uuid in (
      SELECT log_campaign_uuid
      FROM log_campaigns
      WHERE mac_addr = "$sindanClientID"
    )
  ) AS a
LEFT JOIN
  (
  SELECT log_campaign_uuid, occurred_at, detail
  FROM diagnosis_logs
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(occurred_at) AND
    log_type = "noise" AND
    log_campaign_uuid in (
      SELECT log_campaign_uuid
      FROM log_campaigns
      WHERE mac_addr = "$sindanClientID"
    )
  ) As b
ON a.log_campaign_uuid = b.log_campaign_uuid

panels.title: WiFi Status

SELECT
  occurred_at AS "time",
  detail+0 as "Download speedtest"
FROM diagnosis_logs

WHERE
  $__timeFilter(occurred_at) and
  log_type = "v6speedtest_download" and
  log_campaign_uuid in (
    select

    from log_campaigns
    where mac_addr = "$sindanClientID" )
ORDER BY occurred_at

list.definition: SELECT distinct(mac_addr) FROM log_campaigns ORDER BY mac_addr;
list.label: node_id
list.name: sindanClientID
list.query: SELECT distinct(mac_addr) FROM log_campaigns ORDER BY mac_addr;
